Reviews.Title: Almost perfect
Reviews.Author: ChelleyCredible
Reviews.Content: Everything came in as mentioned on the listing. The only problem I had was the battery charger. It ended up being faulty. But the company "Cameta Camera" replaced it without hesitation. They send me a new charger with 1 day shipping. I am satisfied with everything the bundle came with. The remote pictured is actually different than the one I received. The remote I received was bigger than the one in the image. No complaints though because it actually looks cooler. The camera bad is very cheap feeling and looking but not bad for a beginner. I would recommend this for others. Great price for what you receive!

<7> Precision Design 58" Tripod + <8> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <9> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<10> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <11> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors + <12> Image Recovery Software
